text: Attila Berla (born 8 April 1999) is a Hungarian football player who currently plays for Budapest Honvéd. ==Career== ===Budapest Honvéd=== On 4 August 2019, Berla played his first match for Budapest Honvéd in a 1-2 loss against Diósgyőr in the Hungarian League.
